title: Sidebar's Location
description: Controls the location of the sidebar. It can either be on the left or right side of the workspace.

title: Dataset Default Preview Examples
description: The default number of examples to preview.

title: Test Report Default Preview Examples
description: The default number of examples to preview.

title: Algorithm Default Interval Between Iterations
description: Sets the rate at which a step occurs in an algorithm (in milliseconds).

title: Number of Iterations
description: Sets the number of past iterations to show for an algorithms
